name: Jan Ken Fight!
description:
Jan Ken Fight is an adaptation of the famous game: rock-paper-scissors. 

Created for the GBJAM7, it  takes on the appearance of a Gameboy versus-fighting game, but with a pinch of similarity with an old Final Fantasy. I hope the mix will be to your taste ;-) 

The controls of the games are :

1/ Rock-paper-scissors sequence :

- up arrow = paper

- right arrow = scissors

- down arrow = rock

2/ Before enemy attacks :

- left arrow = counter 

n.b. : you need counter(s) in stock to perform one!
